pull.title: Add -loadblock to load from an external blk000?.dat file
pull.body: It scans through the file for valid block signatures, and processes them one by one.

events.body: Is this safe or leaves it a possibility to get a manipulated chain somehow?
It processes the blocks found in the file exactly as if they were received via the network.
Needs rebasing. Sipa broke everything using locks. >_<

events.message: -loadblock to load from an external blk000?.dat file

comments.body: I think it'd be better to print a message here, silently ignoring errors makes me nervous
